plot outline: Prashanth (Naveen Chandra) meets Priya (Shruti Sodhi) on road when she is in an inebriated condition and he drops her home safely. Soon love develops between them, but her rich businessman father (Murali Sharma) disapproves their love, as Prasanth is a poor guy. If you lose something you will know the true value of happiness, tells Prashanth to this businessman and he immediately decides to invest in a loss-incurring business. He decides to make a film that would lose.
title: Meelo Evaru Koteeswarudu
plot: Prashanth meets Priya on road when she is in an inebriated condition and he drops her home safely. Soon love develops between them, but her rich businessman father disapproves their love, as Prasanth is a poor guy.

Prashanth (Naveen Chandra) meets Priya (Shruti Sodhi) on road when she is in an inebriated condition and he drops her home safely. Soon love develops between them, but her rich businessman father (Murali Sharma) disapproves their love, as Prasanth is a poor guy. If you lose something you will know the true value of happiness, tells Prashanth to this businessman and he immediately decides to invest in a loss-incurring business.
